qas.question: Which Cardinals still wear traditional clothing?

plausible_answers.text: the normal dress appropriate to their liturgical tradition

qas.question: What do Western Catholic cardinals continue to wear?

plausible_answers.text: their cassocks with scarlet and wear scarlet fascias,

qas.question: What do Western Catholic cardinals sometimes line?
What color are Western style cassocks made entirely of?
What traditional dress do eastern Catholic deacons continue to wear?

context: <a0_0>Eastern Catholic cardinals<a0_0/> continue to wear <b1_0>the normal dress appropriate to their <b4_0>liturgical<b4_0/> tradition<b1_0/>, though some may line <b2_0>their cassocks with scarlet and wear scarlet fascias,<b2_0/> or in some cases, wear Eastern-style cassocks entirely of <b3_0>scarlet<b3_0/>.
